item.title: Regina
item.description: View this post on Instagram Hello! I‚Äôve set up a website promoting Black-Owned Businesses in Regina. Supporting your local black-owned businesses is one of the ways to be an ally to the Black Lives Matter Movement and promotes more economic opportunities for black communities. Here is the link to website: https://blackownedyqr.carrd.co FULL LIST OF TAGGED ACCOUNTS: @luluzkitchen @selamregina @thebigeasykitchen03 @tboxconcession @adituslaw @capribeautyhair_ltd @hairepisodesalonbeautysupply @kendiboutique @newlineboxing @rosemondafrican @wellnessrevolutionstudio @dare_to_be_fit_nika @cityandlove_ @congresswoodco @dj_sholasleek @kuzabeauty @skylevelimages @heritageregina @handfuldoughco @congresswoodco Please share this with your friends and dm me if you‚Äôd like to be added on to the list!

item.title: Saskatoon

We acknowledge that this is not all of them!! Let‚Äôs share and uplift every single one!) #saskatoon #blackownedbusinesses #blackownedbusinesssaskatoon #yxe #yxeeats #yxeliving #yxelocal #yxebusiness #yxehairstylist #yxefood #yxebeauty A post shared by Nina ‚ú®üáßüá∑ (@ninsalles) on Jun 5, 2020 at 12:03pm PDT

item.title: Toronto
item.description: View this post on Instagram We‚Äôre grateful to the thousands who‚Äôve engaged with and hopefully benefited from yesterday‚Äôs infographic! We now have a high contrast version of the infographic available for visual accessibility. ‚Å£ ‚Å£ We aim to continue building this resource list with community collaboration. If you are/if you know of a Black community-led collective, organisation or business that hasn‚Äôt been included in this resource, please email scarboroughmutualaid@gmail.

item.title: Winnipeg
item.description: View this post on Instagram There are a number of Black and Indigenous led organizations in Winnipeg doing important work. If you‚Äôre looking to support, please consider: ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ @justice4blackliveswinnipeg Donations: Send an e-transfer to Justice4BlackLivesWPG@Gmail.com (please use password: blacklivesmatter) ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ @bear.clan.patrol.315 Donations: https://www.canadahelps.org/en/charities/bear-clan-patrol-inc/ ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ @blackspacewpg Donations: https://www.blackspacewpg.ca/donate or send e-transfers to: blackspacewpg@gmail.com (please use password: blackspace204) ‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ Mama Bear Clan (NPDWC) Info: http://www.
